dataIdInfo.idAbs: This tool will build a Source Mosaic Dataset, intended for intependent QC followed by ingestion into a Derived Mosaic Dataset using the tool with that name. The tool takes as input a Configuration file as a compulsary parameter. Other parameters are optional. If other parameters are defined as input for this tool, then they will take precedence over the values defined in the Configuration file

tool.name: Tool

param.name: Configuration File
param.dialogReference: Path to the Configuration File that will be used for building the Mosaic Dataset

param.name: command
param.dialogReference:
List of the Commands that need to be run on the Mosaic dataset. The List of the commands that can be used are represented by these two letter codes:

  • CM = Create Mosaic Datasets.

  • AF = Add Fields.

  • AR = Add Rasters.

  • CR = Create Referenced MDs.

  • BF = Build Footprints.

  • BB = Build Boundary.

  • IF = Import Fields.

  • IG = Import Geometry.

  • DN = Define NoData values.

  • SP = Set Properties.

  • SS = Set Statistics.

  • CC = Calculate Cell size ranges.

  • BO = Build Overviews.

  • DO = Define Overviews.

  • AI = Add Index.

  • CV = Calculate Values.

  • BP = Build Pyramids.

  • Multiple Commands can be merged with "+" sign. For example, Creation of a Mosaic Dataset followed by Add Fields is represented as CM+AF.

  • IMPORTANT: Commands are executed in the sequence entered in this list box.

param.name: Path to the geodatabase
param.dialogReference: The path and name of a geodatabase. Note - this tool will not CREATE a geodatabase, so it must exist prior to execution.

param.name: Mosaic Dataset Name
param.dialogReference: The name of the Mosaic Dataset to be created.

param.name: Input Data Path
param.dialogReference:
Path and name of the file, folder, raster dataset, raster catalog, mosaic dataset

Path and name of the input raster data to be added into the Mosaic Dataset. This may be a file, folder, raster dataset, raster catalog, or mosaic dataset, depending on the Raster Type.

IMPORTANT NOTE: this script presumes the input Raster Type is "Raster Dataset". If the Raster Dataset type must be changed from default values, the user must create and save an *.art.xml file to define the Raster Type, and input that *.art.xml file into the Configuration file using Configuration editor.

tool.summary: This tool will build a Source Mosaic Dataset, intended for intependent QC followed by ingestion into a Derived Mosaic Dataset using the tool with that name. The tool takes as input a Configuration file as a compulsary parameter. Other parameters are optional. If other parameters are defined as input for this tool, then they will take precedence over the values defined in the Configuration file
